properties.title: The largest alpine thermal spa in Europ Leukerbad
properties.abstract: Not less than 10 pools with warm water of varying temperatures, with water jets and bubbles comprise the largest Alpine thermal water resort in Europe.
properties.description:
The largest alpine thermal spa in Europe.
Spoil yourself in the 10 thermal baths (from 28°C to 43°C) and treat yourself to the wide range of spa facilities at the Burgerbad Therme in Leukerbad (1,400 m above sea level).

Enjoy the rejuvenating thermal water, rich in minerals, from our private springs in the midst of an impressive mountain world. Waterfall showers, massage jets, whirlpools and a natural rock grotto offer superb relaxation and an unforgettable natural bathing experience whatever the weather. Look forward to discovering a wide choice of spa treatments and massages in the spa zone.

The 25 m sports pool, a children’s play pool and Switzerland’s first Xtube tyre slide with banked corners provide ideal surroundings for daredevils and active sports enthusiasts.
properties.name: Leukerbad Therme
